Instruction: In a large pot, combine the water, vinegar, soy sauce, peppercorns, garlic, and salt. Mix well, then add the chicken pieces and simmer uncovered over low heat until the chicken is fully cooked and tender, approximately 25 to 35 minutes.
Take the chicken out of the pot and brown it in a large skillet with oil over medium-high heat.
Return the chicken, along with the oil and juices, to the pot with the reserved sauce. Cover and simmer over medium heat until the sauce thickens to the desired consistency.
